Translations.Text: Ni hai bu zhidao ma? Wo ba emomen fang chuqu youhuo buxindao zhe,
suoyi ni dui tamen buyao jizao, wo zhi shu tamen de shoushu.
Na ri, wo yao ba jingwei zhe jihe dao zhiren zhu di nali, xiangshou en rong.
Wo yao ba fanzui zhe quzhu dao huo yu qu, yi feishui jieke.
Dan yu zhiren zhu ding yue zhe chuwai, renmen bude shuo qing.
Nimen que yi fanle yi jian zhongda zuixing. Weile na jian zuixing,
tian jihu yao po, de jihu yao lie, shan jihu yao beng.
Zhe shi yinwei tamen wangcheng renwei zhiren zhu de erzi.
Zhiren zhu bu hui shouyang erzi,
fan zai tiandi jian de, jianglai meiyou yige bu xiang nupu yiyang guiyi zhiren zhu de.
Ta que yi tongjiguo tamen, jiandianguo tamen.
Fuhuo ri tamen dou yao danshen lai jian ta.
Xindao erqie xingshan zhe, zhiren zhu biding yao shi tamen xiangqin xiang'ai.
Wo yi ni de yuyan, shi “gulanjing” chengwei rongyi de, zhi wei yao ni jie ta xiang jingwei zhe baoxi, bing jinggao qiangbian de minzhong.
Zai tamen zhiqian, wo ceng huimiele xuduo shidai, ni neng faxian naxie shidai zhong de renhe ren, huo tingjian tamen suo fa de wei sheng ma?
